document_data.caption: A map showing the Street of Glances and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Street of Glances
document_data.mainbody: The '''Street of Glances''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The Street of Glances was located in the northwest section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. It ran roughly east to west, originating on [[Westwall Street]] in the west and branching east to end at the [[Heroes' Walk]]. The Street of Glances was intersected by [[Stormstar's Ride]], [[Morningstar Way]], [[Gorl Street]], [[Staghunter's Way]], [[Sighing Maiden's Walk]], [[Telchar Lane]], [[Sniff Alley]], the [[Skulkway]], [[Ivory Street]], the [[Street of Whispers]], and the [[Street of the Singing Dolphin]].
